long_description: Keep 5 oz. of your favorite beverage close at hand with the pocket-sized Stanley Adventure Flask. Stainless-steel interior does not retain flavors or smells; rustproof exterior withstands weather and wear. Bottle opening is easy to sip and pour from; attached cap means you don't have to worry about dropping or losing it. Slim profile slides easily into a pocket or pack. Stanley Adventure Flask measures 4.75 x 2.25 x 1.25 in.
short_description: Keep 5 oz. of your favorite beverage close at hand with the pocket-sized Stanley Adventure Flask.
